monogr.author: Bible
monogr.note: large paper, plates by Hollar, fine copy, ruled with red lines, in old English red morocco, tooled sides, g. e.

This magnificent specimen of the printing of the period was severly censured by Bp. Wetenhal for the errors of the press, amongst which, as the nost dangerous, may be noted Acts vi, 3 “Ye may appoint” instead of “We,” and 1 Tim. iv, 6 “Thy” for “the Doctrine”
